This application need python runtime and pyqt4

*Windows*
 # install python-2.5.2.msi
	http://www.python.org/download/
 # install PyQt-Py2.5-gpl-4.4.3-1.exe
	http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/software/pyqt/download
*Linux*
	1. install python 2.5 and PyQt4 on your destribution.

*Mac*
	1. Download and install packages python lastest version at
	for Mac OS X 10.3.9 or 10.4
		http://www.python.org/download/mac/
	for Mac OS X 10.3(Panther)
		http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/tcltkaqua/TclTkAqua-8.4.10.dmg?download
	or other vesion at
		http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.4.3/Universal-MacPython-2.4.3-2006-04-07.dmg
	2. install SIP for build PyQt4
		http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/software/sip/download
	3. build PyQt4 using SIP
		http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/software/pyqt/download
